description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A potpourri 3D board game with strategic challenge and fun-learning of general knowledge. Compete against the representative of McFishy Corp who wants to take over Merry, Inc. Earn enough gold coins to buy the Xmas tree branches and build the Xmas Tree. Invest and own major stake in Merry, Inc.
description.short: A potpourri 3D board game with strategic challenge and fun-learning of general knowledge. Compete against the representative of McFishy Corp who wants to take over Merry, Inc. Earn enough gold coins to buy the Xmas tree branches and build the Xmas Tree. Invest and own major stake in Merry, Inc.
